title: Nasdaq ends at lowest level since Nov 2020, tech megacaps slump up to 8% - Economic Times
content:
1. Nasdaq ends at lowest level since Nov 2020, tech megacaps slump up to 8%  Economic Times
  2. Dow Plunges 1,000 Points, Tech Shares Crater As Stocks Erase Gains From Post-Fed Rally  Forbes
  3. Stock Market Today: Dow in Biggest Loss Since 2020 as Tech Selloff Turns Ugly  Investing.com India
  4. Wall Street up before Fed meet as tech buying punctuates volatile trade  Moneycontrol
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Technology megacaps slumped. Google-parent Alphabet Inc , Apple Inc, Microsoft Corp, Meta Platforms, Tesla Inc and Amazon.com all fell between 4.3% and 8.3%.
